quiz.text: Which choice below would create a variable called \`doughnuts\` and give it a value of \`12\`?
Which would make a variable \`fruit\` and give it a value of the sum of \`apples\` and \`oranges\`?
Which choice would give the variable \`number\` a value of \`8\`?

directions.dialogText: Give \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\` values that will give \`sum\` a value of \`36\`.

directions.dialogText: Let's review a little! Declare variables called \`apples\`, \`oranges\`, and \`limes\` and give them the correct number values.

levels.mission: Declare variables called \`apples\`, \`oranges\` and \`limes\`. Then give all three variables accurate number values based on the picture.
levels.tools: To declare a variable, type \`var\` followed by the variable's name. Then to give it a value, type an equals sign (\`=\` ) followed by the value you want to give the variable. Finally, finish each line off with a \`;\`.
levels.tips: Sorry! No tips for this level. :)

quiz.text: Which one of the following choices could NOT be the name of a variable?

directions.dialogText: Let's review subtraction! We have declared a variable called \`vanilla\`. Give it the correct number value by subtracting \`strawberry\` from \`cones\` using the \`-\` sign.

levels.mission: Give the variable \`vanilla\` the correct number value by subtracting \`strawberry\` from \`cones\` using the \`-\` sign.
levels.tools:
\`strawberry\`: contains the number of strawberry  \`cones\`: contains the number of cones

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`cones - strawberry\`.

directions.dialogText: Now let's add AND subtract! Declare a variable called \`doubles\`. Give it the correct number value by adding \`chocolate\` and \`strawberry\` and then subtracting \`singles\`.

levels.mission: Create the variable \`doubles\` and give it the correct number value by adding \`chocolate\` and \`strawberry\` and then subtracting \`singles\`.
levels.tools:
\`chocolate\`: contains the number of cones with chocolate ice cream

\`strawberry\`: contains the number of cones with strawberry ice cream

\`singles\`: contains the number of cones with a single scoop

\`+\`: adds numbers together

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`chocolate + strawberry - singles\`.

directions.dialogText: Last level!!! Create a variable called \`ninjas\`. Give it the correct number value by adding \`chickens\` and \`foxes\` and then subtracting \`cowboys\`.

levels.mission: Create the variable \`ninjas\` and give it the correct number value by adding \`chickens\` and \`foxes\` and then subtracting \`cowboys\`.
levels.tools:
\`chickens\`: contains the number of chickens

\`foxes\`: contains the number of foxes

\`cowboys\`: contains the number of cowboys

\`+\`: adds numbers together

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`chickens + foxes - cowboys\`.
